Traits: Dwarven Toughness: Hit point maximum increases by 1 every character level.
Armor Proficiencies | Light Armor, Medium Armor
Superior Darkvision: Darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.
Disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks relying on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

Level 3 | Cast the enlarge/reduce spell on yourself once every long rest, using only the spellâ€™s enlarge option, without material components. You cannot cast this while in direct sunlight, though sunlight has no effect once cast. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability.

Level 5 | Cast the invisibility spell on yourself once every long rest, without material components. You cannot cast this while in direct sunlight, though sunlight has no effect once cast. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability.
Advantage on Saving Throws against Illusions
Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed
Advantage on Saving Throws against being Paralyzed
